title: New: LinG. – Anthracite
body:
And to end the first lonely day of NOT BEING IN AUSTIN, this slaughterhouse of sounds, found in the debut cut from **LinG.**

A producer that we happen to know literally nothing about, other than the fact that he’s from the UK, which isn’t exactly interesting, is it? With support from **Vessel** and **Throwing Snow** however, there’s a high chance he’ll have to come out of the woodwork soon. In the meantime, enjoy [_Anthracite_](https://soundcloud.com/ling-6/anthracite), it’s quite the ride.
